Hoboken.City-As-School High School: City-As-School is a public high school located at 16 Clarkson Street between Hudson Street and Seventh Avenue South in the West Village of Manhattan, New York City. Since its opening in 1972, City As School has been distinguished by its curricular focus on experiential learning through internship. The school has been the nation’s leading external learning or experiential learning model for high school students.
